# Purpose

This script summarizes the Norther Water historical data to grab all of the unique sampling locations for build out of the Landsat C2 pipeline and for any other future use.

``` {r setup, include = F}
library(tidyverse)
data_dir = 'data/waterQuality'
```

## Load database

``` {r}
wq = read.csv(file.path(data_dir, 'WQData_20221118_081620.csv'))
```
